content.rendered:
Directed by Farhad Samji

Written by Tasha Bhambra. Tasha Bhambra. Tushar Hiranandani. Tushar Hiranandani. Tushar Hiranandani. Sparsh Khetarpal. Sparsh Khetarpal. Sajid Nadiadwala. Sajid Nadiadwala. Zeishan Quadri. Zeishan Quadri. Zeishan Quadri. Farhad Samji .Farhad Samji. Farhad Samji. Karthik Subbaraj

Star Akshay Kumar (Bachchhan Paandey). Kriti Sanon (Myra Devekar). Jacqueline Fernandez (Sophie). Pankaj Tripathi (Bhaves Bhoplo). Arshad Warsi (Vishu (Vishwakanth Mahtre)). Prateik Babbar (Virgini Bhai). Sanjay Mishra (Bufferiya Chacha). Sajid Nadiadwala (Film Director). Seema Biswas (Bachcchan Pandey’s Mother). Abhimanyu Singh (Pendulium). Saharsh Kumar Shukla (Kaandi). Mohan Agashe (Laalji Bhagat). Ahmed Khan (Film Director).Md Ariful Islam . Surendra Rajan (Devekar (Myra’s Father)). Nassar Abdulla (Film Director). Ashwin Mushran (Varma Ji). Snehal Dabi (Jumbo). Santosh Shukla (Police SP Suryakant Mishra). Gaurav Chopra (Bheema). Aroosa Khan (Pinky). Amit Shivdas Nair (Rana). Chobber Sidhu (Art Man). Sunil Beniwal (Vijay). Shravan Jakkula (Shravan Jakkula). Umesh Pant (Man 1 (Shooter)). Abhishek Saxena (Abhinav Tripathi (Journalist)). Neeraj Saidawat (Killer). Divyam Agarwal (Divyam Agarwal).Arham Khan . Trishna Singh (Virgin’s Wife). Krishan Bhargav (Reporter). Dolly Thakore (Mala Brocha). Rajan Kavatra (Producer’s Security Guard). Arun Khedwal (Guleria)

Language Hindi

Producers Manoj Mittra. Sajid Nadiadwala. Prashant Sharma

Production Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment. Nadiadwala Sons
